jobDescription: Dynamic and results-driven Partner Solutions Architect with a proven track record of driving business growth and technical innovation within the AWS ecosystem. With over three years of combined experience in software development and cloud architecture, I bring a unique blend of technical expertise and strategic vision to the table.

Collaborated with development team to optimize application architecture for scalability and maintainability
• Analyzed user requirements and derived software design and performance requirements for web applications
• Implemented automated testing and deployment processes, reducing deployment time by 30%
• Debugged existing software and corrected defects, improving application stability by 25%

Developed Proof-of-Concept and MVP projects to validate new architectures and solutions, resulting in a 50% reduction in development time • Completed programming and performed testing and debugging applications, resulting in a 15% reduction in post-deployment bugs • Designed, developed, and deployed web applications on AWS platform using EC2, S3, Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB • Improved web application performance by 20% through implementation of scalable and fault-tolerant systems on AWS
